name: Abstract Dots - Casual Puzzles
description:
Abstract dots is a casual puzzle game.

You move the red dot - till it merges with blue.

easy peasy lemon squeezy!!

Well , well , well....

There is a catch - you can only move on the white blocks- and to travel through reality - you need to switch dimensions - unreal - shadow dimension.

The whole puzzle gets mirrored -  except the block where you as the red dot are placed - a connecting point between the real and the unreal.

Controls :

-> [W,A,S,D] to move red dot.

-> [Space] to change to switch colors of blocks.

-> [Enter] to go to next level.

->Click on Retry button - to restart level.

Rules :

->Color of all blocks switches except the block where the red dot is situated.

-> You can mirror block colors once at each block. (Red indication)

Or you can click on-screen buttons.
